txt.en: 'Whenever you are ready, we can depart, [placeholder].\n\n'I do not think you will have trouble keeping up with me....'
Escort the dying Elf to a tower overlooking the bay
The dying Elf can be found at the top of a tower in Edhellond.\n\nYou have successfully escorted the dying Elf to the top of the tower overlooking the Bay of Belfalas. You should speak to him.

'Thank you, my friend....

'Now... if it is not too much to ask... I desire to spend my final moments in peace.

'Leave me here... and may your deeds today never be forgotten....'
Wounded with no hope of escape from Edhellond, an Elf of the Avorrim seeks to look upon the sea one last time.

'I did not expect to find any aid here... and until I know your intentions, I still do not know what to expect, [placeholder].

'My time grows short, and there is no chance to return... to the cave. To see what these Men have done to Edhellond saddens me deeply, but I cannot change that now....

'All I can ask for now is to look out upon the great bay one last time. Aid me in climbing the tower over there, and you would do me a great, last honour....'
The dying Elf can be found in southern Edhellond, hiding amongst bushes.\n\nYou have come across a dying Elf and should now aid him in realizing his dying wish.
